name: spryt-board
description: Build sprite maps to be used with spryt

scripts.setup: npm run setup:scripts && npm run setup:styles
scripts.scripts:prod: npm run setup:scripts && browserify --transform babelify --outfile project/dist/scripts/main.js project/src/es6/entry/*.js
scripts.scripts:watch: npm run setup:scripts && watchify --debug project/src/es6/entry/*.js --transform babelify --outfile project/dist/scripts/main.js
scripts.styles:watch: npm run setup:styles && npm run sass -- --source-map true && npm run sass -- --source-map true --watch
scripts.styles:prod: npm run setup:styles && npm run sass -- --output-style compressed && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.pages:watch: npm run pages:prod && watch "npm run pages:prod" project/src/pages -d
scripts.prod: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run pages:prod && npm run scripts:prod && npm run styles:prod
